# Pré requisitos para o Curso Integrando GitHub com o RStudio

1- R version > 4.1: [https://cran.r-project.org/](https://cran.r-project.org/)

2- RStudio version > RStudio Desktop 2022.07: [https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download)

3- Install packages
	- `tidyverse` (includes `dplyr`, `tidyr`, `ggplot2`, `magrittr` and other really useful ones)
	- `workflowr`

4- Criar conta no GitHub: [https://github.com/](https://github.com/)

*É possível ter uma conta de estudantes no github, com acesso à vários beneficios:*
[https://education.github.com/students](https://education.github.com/students)

5- Instalar o Git Bash: [Git BASH for Windows](https://gitforwindows.org/)
